title: Help me drop rank?
body: So im pretty rubbish at league tbh. I stopped playing 2 years ago and gave my account to a friend who got it upto gold 3. I started playing again on the same account and am wondering if there is anyway you can drop me down or reset my ranked stats?

replies.body: GIven that account sharing, especially to play ranked, is not allowed and is grounds for a 14 day ban and loss of all ranked rewards, I'd recommend not broadcasting the fact that you have essentially been boosted. If you wanna play ranked I'd recommend either waiting until the season reset, since it'll correct your rank pretty quickly or creating a new account to play ranked on.
